privacy-policy.privacy-policy-description: Welcome to Zerpmon! We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share information about you when you use our website, mobile app, and services.
privacy-policy.personal-information-description: his includes information that you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and payment information when you register for an account, participate in our games, or make transactions.
privacy-policy.usage-information-description: We collect information about your interactions with our services, including the choices you make in our games, your game progress, and your transaction history.
privacy-policy.technical-information-description: This includes your IP address, browser type, device information, and cookies that help us understand how you use our services.
privacy-policy.to-provide-and-maintain-our-services-inc: To provide and maintain our services, including to allow you to participate in gameplay and transactions.
privacy-policy.to-protect-our-platform-and-users-from-f: To protect our platform and users from fraud and abuse.
privacy-policy.to-communicate-with-you-including-sendin: To communicate with you, including sending you updates, security alerts, and support messages.
privacy-policy.to-personalize-your-experience-based-on-: To personalize your experience based on your interactions with our services and preferences.
privacy-policy.we-do-not-share-your-personal-informatio: We do not share your personal information with third parties except:
privacy-policy.to-comply-with-legal-requirements-or-to-: To comply with legal requirements or to respond to legal proceedings.
privacy-policy.to-protect-the-rights-and-safety-of-our-: To protect the rights and safety of our users, the public, or Zerpmon.
privacy-policy.with-service-providers-who-assist-us-in-: With service providers who assist us in our operations and are bound by confidentiality agreements.
privacy-policy.if-zerpmon-is-involved-in-a-merger-acqui: If Zerpmon is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that deal.
privacy-policy.you-have-the-right-to-access-update-or-d: You have the right to access, update, or delete your information. You can also object to or restrict certain processing of your data. Please contact us at
privacy-policy.if-you-would-like-to-exercise-these-righ: if you would like to exercise these rights.
privacy-policy.we-take-security-seriously-and-implement: We take security seriously and implement reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.
privacy-policy.changes-to-this-policy-description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the effective date.
privacy-policy.if-you-have-any-questions-about-this-pol: If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us at our

terms-of-service.information-description: Welcome to Zerpmon! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our website, mobile app, and services (collectively, the "Services"). By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Services.
terms-of-service.eligibility-description: To use our Services, you must be at least 18 years old or have reached the age of majority in your jurisdiction. By using our Services, you represent and warrant that you meet these requirements.
terms-of-service.account-registration-description: To access certain features of our Services, you may need to register for an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the registration process and to keep your account information updated. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms-of-service.use-of-services-description: You agree to use our Services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:
terms-of-service.use-our-services-in-any-way-that-violate: Use our Services in any way that violates any applicable laws or regulations.
terms-of-service.engage-in-any-activity-that-interferes-w: Engage in any activity that interferes with or disrupts the Services.
terms-of-service.attempt-to-gain-unauthorized-access-to-a: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Services or its related systems or networks.
terms-of-service.use-our-services-for-any-commercial-purp: Use our Services for any commercial purpose without our prior written consent.
terms-of-service.ownership-and-intellectual-propperty-des: All content, features, and functionality on our Services, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are the exclusive property of Zerpmon or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws. You agree not to use, reproduce, or distribute any content from our Services without our prior written permission.
terms-of-service.nfts-and-digital-assets-description: Zerpmon allows you to purchase, sell, and trade NFTs and digital assets. You acknowledge that
terms-of-service.the-value-of-nfts-and-digital-assets-is-: The value of NFTs and digital assets is highly speculative and can fluctuate.
terms-of-service.you-are-responsible-for-understanding-th: You are responsible for understanding the risks associated with NFTs and digital assets.
terms-of-service.zerpmon-does-not-guarantee-the-value-or-: Zerpmon does not guarantee the value or performance of any NFTs or digital assets.
terms-of-service.all-transactions-are-final-and-non-refun: All transactions are final and non-refundable.
terms-of-service.termination-description: We may terminate or suspend your access to our Services, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Services will immediately cease.
terms-of-service.disclaimer-of-waraties-description: Our Services are provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. Zerpmon disclaims all warranties, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-description: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Zerpmon shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from
terms-of-service.your-use-or-inability-to-use-the-service: Your use or inability to use the Services.
terms-of-service.any-unauthorized-access-to-or-use-of-our: Any unauthorized access to or use of our servers and/or any personal information stored therein.
terms-of-service.any-interruption-or-cessation-of-transmi: Any interruption or cessation of transmission to or from the Services.
terms-of-service.indemnification-description: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Zerpmon, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, judgments, awards, losses, costs, expenses, or fees (including reasonable attorneys" fees) arising out of or relating to your violation of these Terms or your use of the Services.
terms-of-service.governing-law-description: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Australia, without regard to its conflict of law principles.
terms-of-service.changes-to-terms-description: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the effective date. Your continued use of the Services after the changes take effect constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
terms-of-service.contact-us-description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at our

user-data-deletion.how-to-delete-user-data-on-zerpmon: How to Delete User Data on Zerpmon
user-data-deletion.this-includes-information-that-you-provi: This includes information that you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and payment information when you register for an account, participate in our games, or make transactions.
user-data-deletion.create-a-support-ticket-once-youve-joine: Create a Support Ticket: Once you've joined, navigate to the support channel and create a support ticket.
user-data-deletion.when-creating-your-support-ticket-ensure: When creating your support ticket, ensure you provide the following information to verify your identity and account
user-data-deletion.once-your-request-is-received-our-suppor: Once your request is received, our support team will review it and confirm the deletion request. You may be asked to verify your identity through additional steps to ensure the security of your account.
user-data-deletion.after-your-request-is-confirmed-the-foll: After your request is confirmed, the following steps will be taken to delete your data
user-data-deletion.account-deactivation-your-zerpmon-accoun: Account Deactivation: Your Zerpmon account will be deactivated immediately.
user-data-deletion.data-erasure-all-personal-data-associate: Data Erasure: All personal data associated with your account, including your profile information, transaction history, and any other identifiable information, will be permanently erased from our servers.
user-data-deletion.notification-you-will-receive-a-confirma: Notification: You will receive a confirmation email once your data has been successfully deleted.
user-data-deletion.the-data-deletion-process-typically-take: The data deletion process typically takes between 7 to 14 business days from the date of confirmation. You will be notified if there are any delays or additional steps required.
user-data-deletion.irreversible-action-data-deletion-is-a-p: Irreversible Action: Data deletion is a permanent action. Once your data is deleted, it cannot be recovered.
user-data-deletion.retention-of-non-personal-data-non-perso: Retention of Non-Personal Data: Non-personal data that is not directly linked to your identity may be retained for analytical purposes and to improve our services.
user-data-deletion.legal-obligations-in-certain-cases-we-ma: Legal Obligations: In certain cases, we may be required to retain some of your data to comply with legal obligations, even after a deletion request.
user-data-deletion.can-i-delete-specific-data-instead-of-my: Can I delete specific data instead of my entire account?
user-data-deletion.no-the-data-deletion-process-involves-re: No, the data deletion process involves removing all personal data associated with your account. If you have specific concerns, please create a support ticket in our Discord server to discuss potential solutions.
user-data-deletion.what-happens-to-my-nfts-and-digital-asse: What happens to my NFTs and digital assets?
user-data-deletion.if-your-account-is-a-custodial-wallet-yo: If your account is a custodial wallet, you will need to withdraw your NFTs and digital assets before initiating the data deletion process. For self-custody wallets, your NFTs and digital assets will remain in your possession and are not affected by the data deletion process.
user-data-deletion.how-can-i-verify-that-my-data-has-been-d: How can I verify that my data has been deleted?
user-data-deletion.you-will-receive-a-confirmation-email-on: You will receive a confirmation email once the data deletion process is complete. If you have any concerns or require further verification, you can create a support ticket in our Discord server.
user-data-deletion.can-i-reactivate-my-account-after-deleti: Can I reactivate my account after deletion?
user-data-deletion.no-once-your-data-is-deleted-and-your-ac: No, once your data is deleted and your account is deactivated, it cannot be reactivated. You will need to create a new account if you wish to use Zerpmon services again.
user-data-deletion.for-any-further-questions-or-assistance-: For any further questions or assistance, please join our Discord server and create a support ticket:
user-data-deletion.support-ticket-access-through-the-suppor: Support Ticket: Access through the support channel in our Discord server
user-data-deletion.thank-you-for-being-a-part-of-the-zerpmo: Thank you for being a part of the Zerpmon community. We value your trust and are committed to ensuring your privacy and data security.

metadata.default-title: Zerpmon: Collect, Battle, and Trade Digital Creatures
metadata.default-description: Dive into the world of Zerpmon, the ultimate NFT trading card game! Collect unique digital monsters, engage in epic battles, and trade with players worldwide. Join the Zerpmon community today and experience the future of gaming!

wallet.managed-wallet-warning: This wallet is managed by Zerpmon. Please do not use this wallet for your personal holdings and transactions.
wallet.deposit-funds-description: Send your XRP or ZRP to either classic or X-Address. Both address formats are the same destination address.
wallet.withdrawal-request-success: Withdrawal request submitted successfully. Your funds will be processed and transferred to your destination wallet shortly.
wallet.confirm-correctness: I confirm that the withdrawal details I provided are correct.
wallet.confirm-withdrawal-correctness: I confirm that the withdrawal details I provided are correct.
wallet.withdraw-limit-not-met: Withdrawal amount should be greater than {amount}
wallet.pending-withdrawal: You still have a pending withdrawal. Please wait for it to complete before submitting another withdrawal request
wallet.invalid-amount: Invalid amount. Minimum withdrawal amount is 1.
wallet.withdrew-recently: You have withdrawn within the last 15 minutes. You cannot withdraw more than once every 15 minutes.
wallet.deposit-warning: Please make sure you deposit the minimum amount. Any amount below the minimum will not be reflected in your balance.
wallet.xrpl-trustline-warning: Please make sure your trustline to {currency} is in place. Transaction will fail if trustline is not set.
wallet.transaction-history-desc: On-chain record of incoming and outgoing XRP and ZRP transactions
wallet.confirm-swap: Are you sure you want to swap {amountString} ?
wallet.swap-recently: You cannot swap more than once every {limitString}.
wallet.swap-request-success: Swap request submitted successfully. Your funds will be processed and transferred to your ZerpWallet shortly.
wallet.swap-limit-not-met: Swap amount should be greater than {amount}
wallet.cross-chain-withdraw-note: Cross-chain transaction processing could take several minutes.
wallet.withdrawals-disabled: ZerpWallet withdrawals have been disabled, please open a ticket in our official discord
wallet.deposit-funds-description-trn: Fill in the form below to deposit funds to your account
wallet.futurepass-not-connected: Your FuturePass is not connected. Please connect your FuturePass to deposit funds.
wallet.trn-not-connected: The Root Network API is either not connected or not yet ready
wallet.invalid-amount-deposit: Invalid deposit amount. The minimum deposit amount is 0.001 XRP/ZRP.
wallet.bridge-notice: Depositing funds from The Root Network to ZerpWallet uses a bridge. Bridging takes time and incurs a fee.
